#include<iostream>
#include<malloc.h>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

char compute(char **matrix, int x, int y, int r, int c){
	if(matrix[x][y] == '*')
		return '*';
	int count = 0;			
	if((x > 0) && matrix[x-1][y] == '*')
		count++;
	if((x > 0 && y > 0) && matrix[x-1][y-1] == '*')
		count++;
	if((x > 0 && y < c - 1) && matrix[x-1][y+1] == '*')
		count++;
	if((y > 0) && matrix[x][y-1] == '*')
		count++;
	if((y < c - 1) && matrix[x][y + 1] == '*')
		count++;
	if((x < r - 1) && matrix[x+1][y] == '*')
		count++;
	if((x < r - 1 && y > 0) && matrix[x+1][y-1] == '*')
		count++;
	if((x < r - 1 && y < c - 1) && matrix[x+1][y+1] == '*')
		count++;

	return (char)(count + '0');
}

int main(){
	int r, c;
	int t = 1;
	scanf("%d %d", &r, &c);
	//fflush(stdin);
	while(!(r == 0 && c == 0)){		
		char **mineSweeper = (char**) malloc((r+1)*(c+1));
		char **result = (char**) malloc((r+1)*(c+1));		
		for(int i = 0; i < r; i++){
			mineSweeper[i] = (char*) malloc((c+1));
			scanf("%s", mineSweeper[i]);
			//fflush(stdin);
		}
		printf("Field #%d:\n", t);
		for(int i = 0; i < r; i++){
			result[i] = (char*) malloc((c+1));
			for(int j = 0; j < c; j++){
				result[i][j] = compute(mineSweeper, i, j, r, c);
				printf("%c", result[i][j]);			
			}
			//if(i != r-1)
			printf("\n");
		}
		t++;
		printf("\n");
		scanf("%d %d", &r, &c);
		//printf("%d %d\n",r, c);
		fflush(stdin);
	}
	
}
